data.comment: Nuno Almeida starts the match. Benfica with the kick-off in Lisbon.
Moreirense needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
Throw-in for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 4, Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Lisbon Benfica attack through Darwin Nunez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Nuno Almeida signals a throw-in for Moreirense, close to Benfica's area.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 8, Benfica have a dangerous throw-in.
Pedro Nuno for the away team is judged to be offside.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
In the minute 10, Jan Vertonghen (Benfica) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Can Benfica capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Moreirense's half?
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
Throw-in for Benfica close to the penalty box.
Benfica's Gabriel Appelt gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 15, Benfica are coming forward and Everton gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Nuno Almeida awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Benfica in Lisbon.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Benfica close to the penalty box.
Moreirense needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
Benfica's Gabriel Appelt gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In the minute 21, Goal! Benfica take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Ruben Dias.
Everton with an assist there.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
In the minute 23, Benfica's Darwin Nunez attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 26, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nuno Almeida signals a throw-in for Benfica, close to Moreirense's area.
Benfica are pushing forward but Darwin Nunez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Nuno Almeida signals a Moreirense throw-in in Benfica's half.
Pedro Nuno gets his shot on target but fails to score for Moreirense.
In the minute 28, Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
Benfica's Luca Waldschmidt gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Moreirense defender.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Benfica's Rafa Silva misses with an attempt on goal.
Nuno Almeida awards Moreirense a goal kick.
In the minute 30, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Alex Soares of Moreirense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 31, Pizzi for Benfica has been booked by Nuno Almeida and receives a first yellow card.
Filipe Soares is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Filipe Soares is back on the pitch.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Moreirense.
In the minute 35, Rafa Silva (Benfica) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Moreirense.
Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Moreirense.
In Lisbon Benfica drive forward through Everton. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
In the minute 37, Benfica have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Jan Vertonghen (Benfica) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Moreirense defenders.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Benfica's Pizzi is whistled for offside at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 42, Benfica's Everton misses with an attempt on goal.
Nuno Almeida awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Pizzi of Benfica gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 43, Moreirense have a goal kick.
Nuno Almeida awards the home team a throw-in.
Rafa Silva for Benfica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 43, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Benfica are coming forward and Pizzi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Nuno Almeida awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, In Lisbon Benfica's Darwin Nunez is caught offside.
Free kick Moreirense.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Lisbon - Moreirense with the kick-off.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pizzi for Benfica drives towards goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Nuno Almeida awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Benfica's Luca Waldschmidt breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
Moreirense's Lucas Rodrigues breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Benfica have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Moreirense.
Benfica have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In the minute 54, Benfica's Everton gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Benfica.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Important block from the Moreirense defence as Luca Waldschmidt fires in a strike for Benfica.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
In the minute 60, Free kick Moreirense.
At Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica, Andre Almeida has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ricardo Soares is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica with Felipe Pires replacing Lucas Rodrigues.
In the minute 61, Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nuno Almeida blows against Moreirense's Pedro Nuno for offside.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 64, Benfica's Everton is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, The home team have replaced Luca Waldschmidt with Haris Seferovic. This is the first substitution made today by Jorge Jesus.
Chiquinho is replacing Pizzi for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Moreirense.
Throw-in Benfica.
In the minute 67, Ricardo Soares (Moreirense) is making a second substitution, with Matheus Silva replacing Anthony D`Alberto.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rafa Silva for Benfica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Gabriel Appelt for Benfica drives towards goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Benfica's Haris Seferovic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 71, Moreirense have a goal kick.
Nuno Almeida signals a Moreirense throw-in in Benfica's half.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, In Lisbon Moreirense attack through Pedro Nuno. The finish is off target, however.
Nuno Almeida awards Benfica a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Pedrinho is replacing Rafa Silva for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Benfica.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Benfica.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
In the minute 80, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Goal! Haris Seferovic extends Benfica's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Darwin Nunez to set up the goal.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Ricardo Soares is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica with Goncalo Franco replacing Fabio Pacheco.
In the minute 83, Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ibrahima Camara is on a sub for Alex Soares for Moreirense.
In Lisbon Benfica attack through Pedrinho. The finish is off target, however.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 87, Benfica drive into the zone and Andre Almeida is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
The home team replace Everton with Julian Weigl.
In the minute 88, Benfica make their fifth substitution with Nuno Tavares replacing Alex Grimaldo.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Benfica.
Nuno Almeida signals a Benfica throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Moreirense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Nuno Almeida will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Nuno Almeida awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Moreirense's Pedro Nuno breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nuno Almeida blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
